<p style="border-bottom:Double 2.25pt;padding-bottom:1pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;;font-size:6pt;">&#160;</p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-top:4pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-size:18pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">UNITED STATES</p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-size:18pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE COMMISSION</p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Washington, D.C. 20549</p>
<p style="text-align:center;border-bottom:Solid 0.75pt;padding-bottom:1pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:39.86%;margin-right:37.04%;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:bold;;font-size:4pt;">&#160;</p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-top:4pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-size:18pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">FORM&#160;10&#8209;Q</p>

<td valign="bottom" style="background-color:#CFF0FC;padding-left:0pt;padding-Right:0.75pt;padding-Top:0.75pt;padding-Bottom:0pt;width:10.78%; border-top:solid 0.75pt #000000; border-bottom:double 2.5pt #000000;white-space:nowrap;">

<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">See accompanying notes to condensed consolidated financial statements.</p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">- 7 -</p>
<hr style="page-break-after:always" />
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><a href="#INDEX_FORM_10Q"><span style="text-decoration:underline;">Table of Contents</span></a></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><span style="font-weight:bold;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">LINDSAY CORPORATION AND SUBSIDIARIES</span></p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;" id="NOTES_TO_CONDENSED_CONSOLIDATED_FINANCIA">NOTES TO THE CONDENSED CONSOLIDATED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS</p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">(Unaudited)</p><ix:nonNumeric id="F_000413" name="us-gaap:BasisOfPresentationAndSignificantAccountingPoliciesTextBlock" contextRef="C_0000836157_20190901_20191130" escape="true">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-top:10pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Note 1 &#8211; Basis of Presentation</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-top:10pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">The condensed consolidated financial statements are presented in accordance with the rules and regulations of the Securities and Exchange Commission (the &#8220;SEC&#8221;) and do not include all of the disclosures normally required by U.S. generally accepted accounting principles (&#8220;U.S. GAAP&#8221;) as contained in Lindsay Corporation&#8217;s (the &#8220;Company&#8221;) Annual Report on Form 10-K.&#160;&#160;Accordingly, these condensed consolidated financial statements should be read in conjunction with the consolidated financial statements and notes thereto included in the Company&#8217;s most recent Annual Report on Form 10-K for the fiscal year ended August 31, 2019.</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-top:10pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">In the opinion of management, the condensed consolidated financial statements of the Company reflect all adjustments (consisting of normal recurring accruals) necessary to present fairly the financial position and the results of operations and cash flows for the periods presented.&#160;&#160;The results for interim periods are not necessarily indicative of trends or results expected by the Company for a full year.&#160;&#160;The condensed consolidated financial statements were prepared using U.S. GAAP. These principles require us to make estimates and assumptions that affect the reported amounts of assets and liabilities, the disclosure of contingent assets and liabilities and the reported amounts of revenues and expenses. Actual results could differ from these estimates.&#160;&#160;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p><ix:nonNumeric id="F_000429" name="us-gaap:NewAccountingPronouncementsPolicyPolicyTextBlock" contextRef="C_0000836157_20190901_20191130" escape="true">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-style:italic;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Recent Accounting Guidance Not Yet Adopted</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">In June 2016, the Financial Accounting Standards Board (&#8220;FASB&#8221;) issued Accounting Standards Update (&#8220;ASU&#8221;) No. 2016-13, <span style="font-style:italic;">Financial Instruments - Credit Losses (Topic 326), Measurement of Credit Losses on Financial Instruments</span>. The standard replaces the incurred loss impairment methodology in current U.S. GAAP with a methodology that reflects expected credit losses on instruments within its scope, including trade receivables. This update is intended to provide financial statement users with more decision-useful information about the expected credit losses. The effective date of ASU No.&#160;2016-13 will be the first quarter of the Company&#8217;s fiscal 2021 with early adoption permitted. The Company is currently evaluating the impact of the adoption of ASU No. 2016-13 on its consolidated financial statements.</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-top:10pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-style:italic;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Recent Accounting Guidance Adopted</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">In February 2016, the FASB issued ASU 2016-02, <span style="font-style:italic;">Leases</span>, which requires lessees to recognize a right-of-use asset and a lease liability for most leases and disclose key information about leasing arrangements. The new guidance became effective for the Company in the first quarter of fiscal 2020.&#160;&#160;The Company implemented Accounting Standards Codification (&#8220;ASC&#8221;) 842 and recorded a right of use asset and lease liability of $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000450" name="us-gaap:OperatingLeaseRightOfUseAsset" contextRef="C_0000836157_us-gaapAdjustmentsForNewAccountingPronouncementsAxis_us-gaapAccountingStandardsUpdate201602Member_20191130" decimals="-5" scale="6">26.2</ix:nonFraction> million and $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000451" name="us-gaap:OperatingLeaseLiability" contextRef="C_0000836157_us-gaapAdjustmentsForNewAccountingPronouncementsAxis_us-gaapAccountingStandardsUpdate201602Member_20191130" decimals="-5" scale="6">29.5</ix:nonFraction> million, respectively, upon adoption of the standard on the first day of fiscal 2020. </p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">In August 2017, the FASB issued ASU No. 2017-12, <span style="font-style:italic;">Targeted Improvements to Accounting for Hedging Activities</span>, which modifies the financial reporting of hedging relationships through changes to both the designation and measurement guidance for qualifying hedging relationships and the presentation of hedge results. ASU No. 2017-12 became effective in the first quarter of the Company&#8217;s fiscal 2020.&#160;&#160;The adoption of this ASU did not have a material impact on the Company&#8217;s consolidated financial statements. </p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p></ix:nonNumeric></ix:nonNumeric><ix:nonNumeric id="F_000414" name="us-gaap:RevenueFromContractWithCustomerTextBlock" contextRef="C_0000836157_20190901_20191130" escape="true" continuedAt="F_000414_dcnt_20570c3c-919a-46f3-bdee-25a7ef31e1e4">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-top:10pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Note 2 &#8211; Revenue Recognition </p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-style:italic;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Disaggregation of Revenue</p><ix:nonNumeric id="F_000430" name="us-gaap:DisaggregationOfRevenueTableTextBlock" contextRef="C_0000836157_20190901_20191130" escape="true">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">A breakout by segment of revenue recognized over time versus point in time for the three months ended November 30, 2019 and 2018 is as follows:</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>
<div>

<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><a href="#INDEX_FORM_10Q"><span style="text-decoration:underline;">Table of Contents</span></a></p>

<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><span style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Further disaggregation of revenue is disclosed in the Note 1</span><span style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">6</span><span style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"> &#8211; Industry Segment Information.</span></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">For contracts with a length longer than twelve months, the unsatisfied performance obligations were $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000482" name="lnn:ContractWithCustomerUnsatisfiedPerformanceObligationAmount" contextRef="C_0000836157_20191130" decimals="-5" scale="6">6.1</ix:nonFraction> million at November 30, 2019.</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-style:italic;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Contract Balances </p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:7.25%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Contract assets arise when recorded revenue for a contract exceeds the amounts billed under the terms of such contract. Contract liabilities arise when billed amounts exceed revenue recorded. Amounts are billable to customers upon various measures of performance, including achievement of certain milestones and completion of specified units of completion of the contract. At November 30, 2019 and August 31, 2019, contract assets amounted to $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000483" name="us-gaap:ContractWithCustomerAssetNet" contextRef="C_0000836157_us-gaapBalanceSheetLocationAxis_us-gaapOtherCurrentAssetsMember_20191130" decimals="-5" scale="6">1.2</ix:nonFraction> million and $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000484" name="us-gaap:ContractWithCustomerAssetNet" contextRef="C_0000836157_us-gaapBalanceSheetLocationAxis_us-gaapOtherCurrentAssetsMember_20190831" decimals="-5" scale="6">1.3</ix:nonFraction> million respectively. These amounts are included within other current assets on the condensed consolidated balance sheet.&#160;&#160;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">&#160;&#160;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Contract liabilities include advance payments from customers and billings in excess of delivery of performance obligations. At November 30, 2019 and August 31, 2019, contract liabilities amounted to $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000485" name="us-gaap:ContractWithCustomerLiability" contextRef="C_0000836157_us-gaapBalanceSheetLocationAxis_us-gaapOtherCurrentLiabilitiesMember_20191130" decimals="-5" scale="6">14.7</ix:nonFraction> million and $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000486" name="us-gaap:ContractWithCustomerLiability" contextRef="C_0000836157_us-gaapBalanceSheetLocationAxis_us-gaapOtherCurrentLiabilitiesMember_20190831" decimals="-5" scale="6">18.4</ix:nonFraction> million, respectively. Contract liabilities are included within other current liabilities on the condensed consolidated balance sheets. During the Company&#8217;s three months ended November 30, 2019 and November 30, 2018, the Company recognized $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000487" name="us-gaap:ContractWithCustomerLiabilityRevenueRecognized" contextRef="C_0000836157_20190901_20191130" decimals="-5" scale="6">6.4</ix:nonFraction> million and $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000488" name="us-gaap:ContractWithCustomerLiabilityRevenueRecognized" contextRef="C_0000836157_20180901_20181130" decimals="-5" scale="6">4.6</ix:nonFraction> million of revenue that were included in the liabilities as of August 31, 2019 and August 31, 2018, respectively. The revenue recognized was due to applying advance payments received for the performance obligations completed during the quarter.  </p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;">&#160;</p></ix:continuation><ix:nonNumeric id="F_000415" name="us-gaap:DisposalGroupsIncludingDiscontinuedOperationsDisclosureTextBlock" contextRef="C_0000836157_20190901_20191130" escape="true">
<p style="margin-top:10pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Note 3 &#8211; Divestitures and Held-For-Sale</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">The Company completed the divestiture of its Company-owned irrigation dealership during the first quarter of fiscal 2019 and recorded a loss on sale of $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000489" name="us-gaap:GainLossOnSaleOfBusiness" contextRef="C_0000836157_us-gaapIncomeStatementLocationAxis_us-gaapGeneralAndAdministrativeExpenseMember_20180901_20181130" decimals="-5" sign="-" scale="6">0.1</ix:nonFraction> million included in general and administrative expense on the condensed consolidated statement of earnings for the three months ended November 30, 2018.&#160;&#160;The Company received a note of $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000490" name="us-gaap:NoncashOrPartNoncashDivestitureAmountOfConsiderationReceived1" contextRef="C_0000836157_20180901_20181130" decimals="-5" scale="6">5.8</ix:nonFraction> million as proceeds for this sale. This is included as a noncash investing activity on the condensed consolidated statement of cash flows for the three months ended November 30, 2018.</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Additionally, during the fourth quarter of fiscal 2018, the Company closed <ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_lnnFacility" id="F_000491" name="lnn:NumberOfManufacturingFacilitiesClosed" contextRef="C_0000836157_srtStatementGeographicalAxis_srtNorthAmericaMember_us-gaapStatementBusinessSegmentsAxis_lnnInfrastructureMember_20180831" decimals="INF" format="ixt-sec:numwordsen">one</ix:nonFraction> of its infrastructure manufacturing facilities in North America and consolidated its operations with an irrigation manufacturing facility.&#160;&#160;The building related to the closure is currently listed for sale and is included within the caption &#8220;Assets held-for-sale&#8221; for $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000492" name="us-gaap:AssetsOfDisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperationCurrent" contextRef="C_0000836157_20181130" decimals="-5" scale="6"><ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000493" name="us-gaap:AssetsOfDisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperationCurrent" contextRef="C_0000836157_20191130" decimals="-5" scale="6"><ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000494" name="us-gaap:AssetsOfDisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperationCurrent" contextRef="C_0000836157_20190831" decimals="-5" scale="6">2.7</ix:nonFraction></ix:nonFraction></ix:nonFraction> million in the condensed consolidated balance sheet as of November 30, 2019, November 30, 2018 and August 31, 2019.</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">&#160;</p></ix:nonNumeric><ix:nonNumeric id="F_000416" name="us-gaap:EarningsPerShareTextBlock" contextRef="C_0000836157_20190901_20191130" escape="true" continuedAt="F_000416_dcnt_05511c02-bf56-47cd-a68f-d0282143c6c3">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Note 4 &#8211; Net Earnings per Share</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-top:10pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Basic earnings per share is calculated on the basis of weighted average outstanding common shares.&#160;&#160;Diluted earnings per share is calculated on the basis of basic weighted average outstanding common shares adjusted for the dilutive effect of stock options, restricted stock unit awards and other dilutive securities.&#160;&#160;When a period results in a net loss, the impact of outstanding stock awards is excluded from the diluted loss per share calculation as the inclusion would have an anti-dilutive effect. </p><ix:nonNumeric id="F_000431" name="us-gaap:ScheduleOfEarningsPerShareBasicAndDilutedTableTextBlock" contextRef="C_0000836157_20190901_20191130" escape="true" continuedAt="F_000431_cnt_1">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-top:10pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">The following table shows the computation of basic and diluted net earnings per share for the three months ended November 30, 2019 and 2018:</p></ix:nonNumeric><ix:continuation id="F_000431_cnt_1" continuedAt="F_000431_dcnt_66878634-b047-4732-ab8d-f6e14e0c6bfa">

<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p></ix:continuation></ix:continuation><ix:nonNumeric id="F_000417" name="us-gaap:IncomeTaxDisclosureTextBlock" contextRef="C_0000836157_20190901_20191130" escape="true">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Note 5 &#8211; Income Taxes</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">&#160;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">The Company recorded income tax expense of $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000513" name="us-gaap:IncomeTaxExpenseBenefit" contextRef="C_0000836157_20190901_20191130" decimals="-5" scale="6">2.9</ix:nonFraction> million and $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000514" name="us-gaap:IncomeTaxExpenseBenefit" contextRef="C_0000836157_20180901_20181130" decimals="-5" scale="6">0.5</ix:nonFraction> million for the three months ended November 30, 2019 and 2018, respectively. </p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">It is the Company&#8217;s policy to report income tax expense for interim periods using an estimated annual effective income tax rate.&#160;The estimated annual effective income tax rate was <ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_xbrlipure" id="F_000515" name="us-gaap:EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationChangeInEnactedTaxRate" contextRef="C_0000836157_20190901_20191130" decimals="3" scale="-2">25.8</ix:nonFraction> percent and <ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_xbrlipure" id="F_000516" name="us-gaap:EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationChangeInEnactedTaxRate" contextRef="C_0000836157_20180901_20181130" decimals="3" scale="-2">27.9</ix:nonFraction> percent for the three months ended November 30, 2019 and 2018, respectively. The decrease in the estimated annual effective income tax rate from November 2018 to November 2019 relates primarily to the change in earnings mix among foreign operations.&#160;&#160;The tax effects of significant or unusual items are not considered in the estimated annual effective income tax rate. The tax effects of such discrete events are recognized in the interim period in which the events occur, but the Company did not record any such effects within income tax expense for the three months ended November 30, 2019 or 2018<span style="color:#1F497D;">.&#160;</span></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">&#160;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">The United States enacted significant tax reform into law on December 22, 2017. U.S. Tax Reform made complex and broad changes to the U.S. tax laws.&#160; U.S. Tax Reform established new income tax provisions that will affect the Company&#8217;s fiscal year 2020, including, but not limited to, establishing a new minimum tax on global intangible low-taxed income (&#8220;GILTI&#8221;).&#160; The Company has elected to account for GILTI as a period cost, the effect of which is reflected in the estimated annual effective tax rate of <ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_xbrlipure" id="F_000517" name="us-gaap:EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationChangeInEnactedTaxRate" contextRef="C_0000836157_20190901_20191130" decimals="3" scale="-2">25.8</ix:nonFraction> percent for the three months ended November 30, 2019.&#160; </p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">&#160;&#160;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p></ix:nonNumeric><ix:nonNumeric id="F_000418" name="us-gaap:InventoryDisclosureTextBlock" contextRef="C_0000836157_20190901_20191130" escape="true">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Note 6 &#8211; Inventories</p><ix:nonNumeric id="F_000433" name="us-gaap:ScheduleOfInventoryCurrentTableTextBlock" contextRef="C_0000836157_20190901_20191130" escape="true" continuedAt="F_000433_cnt_1">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-top:10pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Inventories consisted of the following as of November 30, 2019, November 30, 2018, and August 31, 2019:</p></ix:nonNumeric><ix:continuation id="F_000433_cnt_1">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>

<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p></ix:continuation></ix:nonNumeric><ix:nonNumeric id="F_000420" name="us-gaap:DerivativeInstrumentsAndHedgingActivitiesDisclosureTextBlock" contextRef="C_0000836157_20190901_20191130" escape="true" continuedAt="F_000420_dcnt_1238d7f9-0ac8-42c1-ab16-bce071b8f8af">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Note 8 &#8211; Financial Derivatives </p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-top:10pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">The Company uses certain financial derivatives to mitigate its exposure to volatility in foreign currency exchange rates.&#160;&#160;The Company uses these derivative instruments to hedge exposures in the ordinary course of business and does not invest in derivative instruments for speculative purposes.&#160;&#160;The Company manages market and credit risks associated with its derivative instruments by establishing and monitoring limits as to the types and degree of risk that may be undertaken, and by entering into transactions with counterparties that have investment grade credit ratings. <ix:nonNumeric id="F_000436" name="us-gaap:ScheduleOfDerivativeInstrumentsInStatementOfFinancialPositionFairValueTextBlock" contextRef="C_0000836157_20190901_20191130" escape="true" continuedAt="F_000436_cnt_1"> Fair values of derivative instruments are as follows:</ix:nonNumeric></p><ix:continuation id="F_000436_cnt_1">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>

<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><a href="#INDEX_FORM_10Q"><span style="text-decoration:underline;">Table of Contents</span></a></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p><ix:continuation id="F_000420_dcnt_1238d7f9-0ac8-42c1-ab16-bce071b8f8af">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-top:10pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-style:italic;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><span style="font-style:italic;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Net Investment Hedging Relationships</span></p><ix:nonNumeric id="F_000437" name="us-gaap:ScheduleOfDerivativeInstrumentsEffectOnOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossTableTextBlock" contextRef="C_0000836157_20190901_20191130" escape="true" continuedAt="F_000437_cnt_1">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-top:10pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">The amount of gain (loss) recognized in other comprehensive income is as follows:</p></ix:nonNumeric><ix:continuation id="F_000437_cnt_1">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>
<div>
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="margin:auto;border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">
<tr>
<td valign="bottom" style="background-color:#FFFFFF;padding-left:0pt;padding-Right:0.75pt;padding-Top:0.75pt;width:66.84%; border-bottom:solid 0.75pt transparent;">

<td valign="bottom" style="background-color:#CFF0FC;padding-left:0pt;padding-Right:0.75pt;padding-Top:0.75pt;padding-Bottom:0pt;width:1.66%;">
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">&#160;</p></td>

<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">$</p></td>
<td valign="bottom" style="background-color:#CFF0FC;padding-left:0pt;padding-Right:0.75pt;padding-Top:0.75pt;padding-Bottom:0pt;width:12.9%; border-top:solid 0.75pt #000000;white-space:nowrap;">
<p style="text-align:right;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">(<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000585" name="us-gaap:OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedGainLossOnDerivativesArisingDuringPeriodBeforeTax" contextRef="C_0000836157_us-gaapFinancialInstrumentAxis_us-gaapForwardContractsMember_20190901_20191130" decimals="-3" sign="-" scale="3">76</ix:nonFraction></p></td>

<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">&#160;</p></td>
<td valign="bottom" style="background-color:#CFF0FC;padding-left:0pt;padding-Right:0.75pt;padding-Top:0.75pt;padding-Bottom:0pt;width:1%; border-top:solid 0.75pt #000000;white-space:nowrap;">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">$</p></td>

<p style="text-align:right;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000586" name="us-gaap:OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedGainLossOnDerivativesArisingDuringPeriodBeforeTax" contextRef="C_0000836157_us-gaapFinancialInstrumentAxis_us-gaapForwardContractsMember_20180901_20181130" decimals="-3" scale="3">651</ix:nonFraction></p></td>

<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;color:#000000;font-size:1pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">&#160;</p></td>

</table></div>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p></ix:continuation>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">For the three months ended November 30, 2019 and 2018, the Company settled foreign currency forward contracts resulting in an after-tax net gain of $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000589" name="us-gaap:TranslationAdjustmentForNetInvestmentHedgeIncreaseDecreaseNetOfTax" contextRef="C_0000836157_us-gaapDerivativeInstrumentsGainLossByHedgingRelationshipAxis_us-gaapNetInvestmentHedgingMember_20190901_20191130" decimals="-5" scale="6">0.8</ix:nonFraction> million and $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000590" name="us-gaap:TranslationAdjustmentForNetInvestmentHedgeIncreaseDecreaseNetOfTax" contextRef="C_0000836157_us-gaapDerivativeInstrumentsGainLossByHedgingRelationshipAxis_us-gaapNetInvestmentHedgingMember_20180901_20181130" decimals="-5" scale="6">0.7</ix:nonFraction> million, respectively, which were included in other comprehensive income as part of a currency translation adjustment. There were <ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000591" name="us-gaap:DerivativeInstrumentsGainLossRecognizedInIncomeIneffectivePortionAndAmountExcludedFromEffectivenessTestingNet" contextRef="C_0000836157_us-gaapDerivativeInstrumentsGainLossByHedgingRelationshipAxis_us-gaapNetInvestmentHedgingMember_20190901_20191130" decimals="-6" format="ixt-sec:numwordsen" scale="6"><ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000592" name="us-gaap:DerivativeInstrumentsGainLossRecognizedInIncomeIneffectivePortionAndAmountExcludedFromEffectivenessTestingNet" contextRef="C_0000836157_us-gaapDerivativeInstrumentsGainLossByHedgingRelationshipAxis_us-gaapNetInvestmentHedgingMember_20180901_20181130" decimals="-6" format="ixt-sec:numwordsen" scale="6">no</ix:nonFraction></ix:nonFraction> amounts recorded in the condensed consolidated statements of earnings related to ineffectiveness of foreign currency forward contracts related to net investment hedges for the three months ended November 30, 2019 and 2018. </p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-top:10pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">At November 30, 2019, November 30, 2018, and August 31, 2019, the Company had outstanding foreign currency forward contracts to sell a notional amount of <ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217EUR" id="F_000593" name="us-gaap:DerivativeNotionalAmount" contextRef="C_0000836157_us-gaapDerivativeInstrumentsGainLossByHedgingRelationshipAxis_us-gaapNetInvestmentHedgingMember_20191130" decimals="-5" scale="6">32.7</ix:nonFraction>&#160;million Euro, <ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217EUR" id="F_000594" name="us-gaap:DerivativeNotionalAmount" contextRef="C_0000836157_us-gaapDerivativeInstrumentsGainLossByHedgingRelationshipAxis_us-gaapNetInvestmentHedgingMember_20181130" decimals="-5" scale="6">32.5</ix:nonFraction> million Euro, and <ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217EUR" id="F_000595" name="us-gaap:DerivativeNotionalAmount" contextRef="C_0000836157_us-gaapDerivativeInstrumentsGainLossByHedgingRelationshipAxis_us-gaapNetInvestmentHedgingMember_20190831" decimals="-5" scale="6">32.7</ix:nonFraction> million Euro, respectively, at fixed prices to settle during the next fiscal quarter. &#160;The Company&#8217;s foreign currency forward contracts qualify as hedges of a net investment in foreign operations. </p>
<p style="margin-top:10pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-style:italic;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Derivatives Not Designated as Hedging Instruments</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-top:10pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">The Company generally does not elect hedge accounting treatment for derivative contracts related to future settlements of foreign denominated intercompany receivables and payables.&#160;&#160;If the Company does not elect hedge accounting treatment for a derivative, the Company carries the derivative at its fair value in the condensed consolidated balance sheets and recognizes any subsequent changes in its fair value during a period through earnings in the condensed consolidated statements of earnings.&#160;&#160;At November 30, 2019, November 30, 2018, and August 31, 2019, the Company had notional value of $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000596" name="us-gaap:DerivativeNotionalAmount" contextRef="C_0000836157_us-gaapDerivativeInstrumentRiskAxis_us-gaapForeignExchangeForwardMember_us-gaapHedgingDesignationAxis_us-gaapNondesignatedMember_20191130" decimals="-5" scale="6">0.5</ix:nonFraction>&#160;million, $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000597" name="us-gaap:DerivativeNotionalAmount" contextRef="C_0000836157_us-gaapDerivativeInstrumentRiskAxis_us-gaapForeignExchangeForwardMember_us-gaapHedgingDesignationAxis_us-gaapNondesignatedMember_20181130" decimals="-5" scale="6">1.9</ix:nonFraction>&#160;million, and $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000598" name="us-gaap:DerivativeNotionalAmount" contextRef="C_0000836157_us-gaapDerivativeInstrumentRiskAxis_us-gaapForeignExchangeForwardMember_us-gaapHedgingDesignationAxis_us-gaapNondesignatedMember_20190831" decimals="-5" scale="6">1.8</ix:nonFraction>&#160;million, respectively, of U.S. dollar equivalent of foreign currency forward contracts outstanding that are not designated as hedging instruments.</p></ix:continuation><ix:nonNumeric id="F_000421" name="us-gaap:LesseeOperatingLeasesTextBlock" contextRef="C_0000836157_20190901_20191130" escape="true" continuedAt="F_000421_dcnt_d1d94101-f14e-467a-a214-fcae1eb8f5fc">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-top:10pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Note 9 &#8211; Leases</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">The Company, as lessee, has operating leases primarily for office space, manufacturing facilities, equipment, and vehicles. The Company determines if a contract is or contains a lease at the inception of the contract based on whether the contract conveys the right to control the use of an identified asset over a period of time in exchange for consideration.</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">The Company elected, for all classes of underlying assets, to not separate lease and non-lease components and instead will treat the lease agreement as a single lease component for all asset classes. The Company additionally elected practical expedients to not reassess whether existing contracts are or contain leases, the classification of any existing leases, accounting for initial direct costs for any existing leases, and hindsight in determining the lease term and in assessing impairment of the right-of-use (&#8220;ROU&#8221;) asset. </p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Short-term operating leases, which have an initial expected term of twelve months or less, are not recorded on the condensed consolidated balance sheet. Such fixed lease payments are recognized within the condensed consolidated statement of earnings on a straight-line basis over the lease term. Any variable payments associated with short-term operating leases are recognized within the condensed consolidated statement of earnings as they are incurred. The Company did <ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000599" name="us-gaap:OperatingLeaseExpense" contextRef="C_0000836157_20190901_20191130" decimals="INF" format="ixt-sec:numwordsen">no</ix:nonFraction>t recognize any expense for such leases during the three months ended November 30, 2019.</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Many of the Company&#8217;s leases contain renewal or extension options. The Company includes all renewal or extension periods that it is reasonably certain to exercise at lease commencement within the measurement of the ROU asset and lease liability. </p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">The Company&#8217;s lease portfolio consists of operating leases which are included in operating lease ROU assets and operating lease liabilities in the condensed consolidated balance sheet. Operating lease ROU assets and liabilities are recognized at the lease commencement date based on the present value of lease payments over the lease term. To calculate the present value of future lease payments, the Company uses an incremental borrowing rate that estimates a collateralized rate based on the expected term of the lease.</p></ix:nonNumeric>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">- 12 -</p>
<hr style="page-break-after:always" />
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><a href="#INDEX_FORM_10Q"><span style="text-decoration:underline;">Table of Contents</span></a></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p><ix:continuation id="F_000421_dcnt_d1d94101-f14e-467a-a214-fcae1eb8f5fc"><ix:nonNumeric id="F_000438" name="us-gaap:LeaseCostTableTextBlock" contextRef="C_0000836157_20190901_20191130" escape="true">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-top:10pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Lease cost and other information related to the Company&#8217;s operating leases are as follows:</p>
<div>
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="margin:auto;border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">
<tr>
<td valign="bottom" style="background-color:#FFFFFF;padding-left:0pt;padding-Right:0.75pt;padding-Top:0.75pt;padding-Bottom:0pt;width:80.02%; border-bottom:solid 0.75pt #000000;">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;font-weight:bold;color:#000000;font-size:8pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"> ($ in thousands)</p></td>
<td valign="bottom" style="background-color:#FFFFFF;padding-left:0pt;padding-Right:0.75pt;padding-Top:0.75pt;width:2.06%; border-bottom:solid 0.75pt transparent;">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;font-weight:bold;color:#000000;font-size:7pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">&#160;</p></td>
<td colspan="2" valign="bottom" style="background-color:#FFFFFF;padding-left:0pt;padding-Right:0.75pt;padding-Top:0.75pt;padding-Bottom:0pt;width:16.88%; border-bottom:solid 0.75pt #000000;">
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;font-weight:bold;color:#000000;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">November 30,</p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;font-weight:bold;color:#000000;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">2019</p></td>
<td valign="bottom" style="background-color:#FFFFFF;padding-left:0pt;padding-Right:0.75pt;padding-Top:0.75pt;width:1%;white-space:nowrap;">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;font-weight:bold;color:#000000;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">&#160;</p></td>

<td valign="top" style="background-color:#CFF0FC;padding-left:0pt;padding-Right:0.75pt;padding-Top:0.75pt;padding-Bottom:0pt;width:80.02%; border-top:solid 0.75pt #000000;">

<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p></ix:continuation>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:1pt;">&#160;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">There were <ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000665" name="us-gaap:AssetsFairValueAdjustment" contextRef="C_0000836157_us-gaapFairValueByMeasurementFrequencyAxis_us-gaapFairValueMeasurementsNonrecurringMember_20190901_20191130" decimals="INF" format="ixt-sec:numwordsen"><ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000667" name="us-gaap:LiabilitiesFairValueAdjustment" contextRef="C_0000836157_us-gaapFairValueByMeasurementFrequencyAxis_us-gaapFairValueMeasurementsNonrecurringMember_20190901_20191130" decimals="INF" format="ixt-sec:numwordsen"><ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000666" name="us-gaap:AssetsFairValueAdjustment" contextRef="C_0000836157_us-gaapFairValueByMeasurementFrequencyAxis_us-gaapFairValueMeasurementsNonrecurringMember_20180901_20181130" decimals="INF" format="ixt-sec:numwordsen"><ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000668" name="us-gaap:LiabilitiesFairValueAdjustment" contextRef="C_0000836157_us-gaapFairValueByMeasurementFrequencyAxis_us-gaapFairValueMeasurementsNonrecurringMember_20180901_20181130" decimals="INF" format="ixt-sec:numwordsen">no</ix:nonFraction></ix:nonFraction></ix:nonFraction></ix:nonFraction> required fair value adjustments for assets and liabilities measured at fair value on a non-recurring basis for the three months ended November 30, 2019 or 2018.</p></ix:continuation><ix:nonNumeric id="F_000423" name="us-gaap:CommitmentsAndContingenciesDisclosureTextBlock" contextRef="C_0000836157_20190901_20191130" escape="true" continuedAt="F_000423_dcnt_4777ddc1-b145-4fad-a3c7-fbb990409091">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-top:10pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Note 11 &#8211; Commitments and Contingencies</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-top:10pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">In the ordinary course of its business operations, the Company enters into arrangements that obligate it to make future payments under contracts such as lease agreements. Additionally, the Company is involved, from time to time, in commercial litigation, employment disputes, administrative proceedings, business disputes and other legal proceedings.&#160;&#160;The Company has established accruals for certain proceedings where those proceedings present loss contingencies that are both probable and reasonably estimable at the time of determination. The Company believes that any such currently-pending proceedings are either covered by insurance or would not have a material effect on the business or its consolidated financial statements if decided in a manner that is unfavorable to the Company. Such proceedings are exclusive of environmental remediation matters which are discussed separately below. </p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-top:10pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-style:italic;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Infrastructure Products</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-top:10pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">The Company is currently defending a number of product liability lawsuits arising out of vehicle collisions with highway barriers incorporating the Company&#8217;s <span style="font-style:italic;">X-Lite</span>&#174; end terminal.&#160; Despite the September 2017 reversal of a sizable judgment against a competitor, the Company expects that the significant attention brought to the infrastructure products industry by the original judgment may lead to additional lawsuits being filed against the Company and others in the industry.&#160; The Company believes it has meritorious factual and legal defenses to each of these lawsuits and is prepared to vigorously defend its interests.&#160; Based on the information currently available to the Company, the Company does not believe that a loss is probable in any of these lawsuits&#59; therefore,&#160;no accrual has been included in the Company&#8217;s condensed consolidated financial statements.&#160;&#160;While it is possible that a loss may be incurred, the Company is unable to estimate a range of potential loss due to the complexity and current status of these lawsuits. However, the Company maintains insurance coverage to mitigate the impact of adverse exposures in these lawsuits and does not expect that these lawsuits will have a material adverse effect on its business or its consolidated financial statements.</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-top:10pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">In June 2019, the Company was informed by letter that the Department of Justice, Civil Division and U.S. Attorney&#8217;s Office for the Northern District of New York, with the assistance of the Department of Transportation, Office of Inspector General, are conducting an investigation of the Company relating to the Company&#8217;s X-Lite end terminal and potential violations of the federal civil False Claims Act.&#160;&#160;Depending on the outcome of this matter, there could be a material adverse effect on the Company&#8217;s business or its consolidated financial statements.&#160;&#160;Given the current posture of the matter, the Company is unable to estimate a range of potential loss, if any, or to express an opinion regarding the ultimate outcome.</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-top:10pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-style:italic;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Environmental Remediation</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:10pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">The Company has committed to a preliminary plan to remediate environmental contamination of the groundwater at and adjacent to its Lindsay, Nebraska facility (the &#8220;site&#8221;) as a result of discussions with the U.S. Environmental Protection Agency (the &#8220;EPA&#8221;) and the Nebraska Department of Environmental Quality (the &#8220;NDEQ&#8221;) during the third quarter of fiscal 2016.&#160;&#160;The proposed remediation plan is preliminary and has not been approved by the EPA or the NDEQ.&#160;&#160;Based on guidance from third-party environmental experts and the preliminary discussions with the EPA, the Company anticipates that a definitive plan will not be agreed upon until the second half of fiscal 2020 or later. </p></ix:nonNumeric>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">- 14 -</p>
<hr style="page-break-after:always" />
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><a href="#INDEX_FORM_10Q"><span style="text-decoration:underline;">Table of Contents</span></a></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p><ix:continuation id="F_000423_dcnt_4777ddc1-b145-4fad-a3c7-fbb990409091">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:10pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">The current estimated aggregate accrued cost of this remediation plan of $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000669" name="us-gaap:AccrualForEnvironmentalLossContingencies" contextRef="C_0000836157_us-gaapEnvironmentalRemediationSiteAxis_lnnLindsayNebraskaFacilityMember_20191130" decimals="-5" scale="6">15.8</ix:nonFraction> million is based on consideration of several remediation options that would use different technologies, each of which the Company believes could be successful in meeting the long-term regulatory requirements of the site.&#160;&#160;The Company accrues the anticipated cost of investigation and remediation when the obligation is probable and can be reasonably estimated. While the Company believes the current accrual is a good faith estimate of the long-term cost of remediation at this site based on the preliminary analysis available at the time of this filing, the estimate of costs and their timing could change as a result of a number of factors, including (1)&#160;EPA and NDEQ input on the proposed remediation plan and any changes which they may subsequently require, (2)&#160;refinement of cost estimates and length of time required to complete remediation and post-remediation operations and maintenance, (3)&#160;effectiveness of the technology chosen in remediation of the site as well as changes in technology that may be available in the future, and (4)&#160;unforeseen circumstances existing at the site. As a result of these factors, the actual amount of costs incurred by the Company in connection with the remediation of contamination of its Lindsay, Nebraska site could exceed the amounts accrued for this expense at this time.&#160;&#160;While any revisions could be material to the operating results of any fiscal quarter or fiscal year, the Company does not expect such additional expenses would have a material adverse effect on its liquidity or financial condition. <ix:nonNumeric id="F_000443" name="lnn:SummaryOfUndiscountedEnvironmentalRemediationLiabilityClassificationsTableTextBlock" contextRef="C_0000836157_20190901_20191130" escape="true" continuedAt="F_000443_cnt_1">The following table summarizes the undiscounted environmental remediation liability classifications included in the condensed consolidated balance sheets as of November 30, 2019, November 30, 2018, and August 31, 2019:</ix:nonNumeric></p><ix:continuation id="F_000443_cnt_1">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>

<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;font-weight:bold;color:#000000;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">November 30,</p>

<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p></ix:continuation></ix:continuation><ix:nonNumeric id="F_000424" name="us-gaap:ProductWarrantyDisclosureTextBlock" contextRef="C_0000836157_20190901_20191130" escape="true">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Note 12 &#8211; Warranties </p><ix:nonNumeric id="F_000444" name="us-gaap:ScheduleOfProductWarrantyLiabilityTableTextBlock" contextRef="C_0000836157_20190901_20191130" escape="true">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-top:10pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">The following table provides the changes in the Company&#8217;s product warranties:</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-top:10pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>
<div>
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="margin:auto;border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">

<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p></ix:nonNumeric><ix:nonNumeric id="F_000425" name="us-gaap:DisclosureOfCompensationRelatedCostsShareBasedPaymentsTextBlock" contextRef="C_0000836157_20190901_20191130" escape="true" continuedAt="F_000425_dcnt_5e8d9629-d9b1-45c4-a85b-f77a1d60dc91">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Note 13 &#8211; Share-Based Compensation</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">The Company&#8217;s current share-based compensation plans, approved by the stockholders of the Company, provides for awards of stock options, restricted shares, restricted stock units (&#8220;RSUs&#8221;), stock appreciation rights, performance shares, and performance stock units (&#8220;PSUs&#8221;) to employees and non-employee directors of the Company.&#160;&#160;The Company measures and recognizes compensation expense for all share-based payment awards made to employees and directors based on estimated fair values. Share-based compensation expense was $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000687" name="us-gaap:AllocatedShareBasedCompensationExpense" contextRef="C_0000836157_20190901_20191130" decimals="-5" scale="6">1.2</ix:nonFraction>&#160;&#160;million and $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000688" name="us-gaap:AllocatedShareBasedCompensationExpense" contextRef="C_0000836157_20180901_20181130" decimals="-5" scale="6">1.3</ix:nonFraction> million for the three months ended November 30, 2019 and 2018, respectively. </p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">&#160;</p><ix:nonNumeric id="F_000445" name="us-gaap:ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShareBasedPaymentAwardOptionsGrantsInPeriodWeightedAverageGrantDateFairValueTableTextBlock" contextRef="C_0000836157_20190901_20191130" escape="true">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">The following table illustrates the type and fair value of share-based compensation awards granted during the three months ended November 30, 2019 and 2018:</p>

<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">The PSUs granted during fiscal 2020 include performance goals based on a return on net assets and total shareholder return (TSR) relative to the Company&#8217;s peers during the performance period. The awards actually earned will range from <ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_xbrlipure" id="F_000715" name="lnn:ShareBasedCompensationShareBasedPaymentAwardPercentageEarningRange" contextRef="C_0000836157_srtRangeAxis_srtMinimumMember_us-gaapAwardTypeAxis_us-gaapPerformanceSharesMember_20190901_20191130" decimals="2" format="ixt-sec:numwordsen" scale="-2">zero</ix:nonFraction> to <span style="-sec-ix-hidden:F_000716">two hundred</span> percent of the targeted number of PSUs and will be paid in shares of common stock. Shares earned will be distributed upon vesting on the first day of November following the end of the three-year performance period.&#160;&#160;For the return on net assets portion of the award, the Company is accruing compensation expense based on the estimated number of shares expected to be issued utilizing the most current information available to the Company at the date of the financial statements.&#160;&#160;For the TSR portion of the award, compensation expense is recorded ratably over the <span style="-sec-ix-hidden:F_000717">three-year</span> term of the award based on the estimated grant date fair value. </p><ix:nonNumeric id="F_000447" name="lnn:ScheduleOfShareBasedPaymentAwardOtherThanOptionsValuationAssumptionsTableTextBlock" contextRef="C_0000836157_20190901_20191130" escape="true">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">The fair value of the TSR portion of the awards granted during the three months ended November 30, 2019 and 2018 was estimated at the grant date using a Monte Carlo simulation model which included the following assumptions: </p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>

<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Note 15 &#8211; Share Repurchases</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-top:10pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">There were <ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_xbrlishares" id="F_000759" name="us-gaap:TreasuryStockSharesAcquired" contextRef="C_0000836157_20190901_20191130" decimals="INF" format="ixt-sec:numwordsen"><ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_xbrlishares" id="F_000760" name="us-gaap:TreasuryStockSharesAcquired" contextRef="C_0000836157_20180901_20181130" decimals="INF" format="ixt-sec:numwordsen">no</ix:nonFraction></ix:nonFraction> shares repurchased during the three months ended November 30, 2019 and November 30, 2018 under the Company&#8217;s share repurchase program. The remaining amount available under the repurchase program was $<ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_iso4217USD" id="F_000761" name="us-gaap:StockRepurchaseProgramRemainingAuthorizedRepurchaseAmount1" contextRef="C_0000836157_20191130" decimals="-5" scale="6">63.7</ix:nonFraction>&#160;million as of November 30, 2019. </p></ix:nonNumeric>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;;font-size:1pt;">&#160;</p><ix:nonNumeric id="F_000428" name="us-gaap:SegmentReportingDisclosureTextBlock" contextRef="C_0000836157_20190901_20191130" escape="true" continuedAt="F_000428_dcnt_818044c9-9fc4-4bfe-adb6-439ab95cd1b5">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-top:10pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Note 16 &#8211; Industry Segment Information</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-top:10pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">The Company manages its business activities in <ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_lnnSegment" id="F_000762" name="us-gaap:NumberOfReportableSegments" contextRef="C_0000836157_20190901_20191130" decimals="INF" format="ixt-sec:numwordsen">two</ix:nonFraction> reportable segments: irrigation and infrastructure.&#160;&#160;The Company evaluates the performance of its reportable segments based on segment sales, gross profit and operating income, with </p></ix:nonNumeric>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">- 16 -</p>
<hr style="page-break-after:always" />
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><a href="#INDEX_FORM_10Q"><span style="text-decoration:underline;">Table of Contents</span></a></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p><ix:continuation id="F_000428_dcnt_818044c9-9fc4-4bfe-adb6-439ab95cd1b5">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-top:10pt;margin-bottom:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><span style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">operating income for segment purposes excluding unallocated corporate general and administrative expenses, interest income, interest expense, other income and expenses and income taxes.&#160;&#160;Operating income for segment purposes includes general and administrative expenses, selling expenses, engineering and research expenses and other overhead charges directly attributable to the segment.&#160;&#160;There are no inter-segment sales included in the amounts disclosed. <p style="text-align:justify;margin-top:10pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-style:italic;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Irrigation - <span style="font-style:normal;">This reporting segment includes the manufacture and marketing of center pivot, lateral move, and hose reel irrigation systems, as well as various innovative technology solutions such as GPS positioning and guidance, variable rate irrigation, remote irrigation management and scheduling technology, irrigation consulting and design and industrial &#8220;internet of things&#8221;, or IoT, solutions.&#160;&#160;The irrigation reporting segment consists of <ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_lnnSegment" id="F_000767" name="us-gaap:NumberOfOperatingSegments" contextRef="C_0000836157_us-gaapStatementBusinessSegmentsAxis_lnnIrrigationMember_20190901_20191130" decimals="INF" format="ixt-sec:numwordsen">one</ix:nonFraction> operating segment.&#160; &#160;</span></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-top:10pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-style:italic;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Infrastructure<span style="font-style:normal;"> &#8211;&#160;This reporting segment includes the manufacture and marketing of moveable barriers, specialty barriers, crash cushions and end terminals, and road marking and road safety equipment&#59; the manufacturing and selling of large diameter steel tubing and railroad signals and structures&#59; and providing outsourced manufacturing and production services.&#160;&#160;The infrastructure reporting segment consists of <ix:nonFraction unitRef="U_lnnSegment" id="F_000768" name="us-gaap:NumberOfOperatingSegments" contextRef="C_0000836157_us-gaapStatementBusinessSegmentsAxis_lnnInfrastructureMember_20190901_20191130" decimals="INF" format="ixt-sec:numwordsen">one</ix:nonFraction> operating segment. </span></p><ix:nonNumeric id="F_000449" name="us-gaap:ScheduleOfSegmentReportingInformationBySegmentTextBlock" contextRef="C_0000836157_20190901_20191130" escape="true" continuedAt="F_000449_cnt_1">
